items.title: McDONALD'S ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
items.description: Today, McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock payable on June 16, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 2, 2025.

items.title: Investors sue Krispie Kreme after McDonald’s donut deal falls to the McWaySide
items.description: The suit alleges that the donut maker made ‘materially false’ and misleading statements about the partnership, and failed to notify investors that the venture was not profitable

items.title: A Look At The Intrinsic Value Of McDonald's Corporation (NYSE:MCD)
items.description: Key Insights Using the 2 Stage Free Cash Flow to Equity, McDonald's fair value estimate is US$347 With US$321 share...

items.title: Tariff-Driven Dollar Woes Help Brighten First-Quarter Earnings
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- Tariffs unexpectedly devaluing the US dollar — and in turn boosting corporate earnings — was one of the few bright spots of the first-quarter earnings season in North America. items.title: Krispy Kreme sued by investors over McDonald’s rollout pause
items.description: The lawsuit claims the chain failed to disclose profitability issues it was having with the QSR partnership, which subsequently led to a steep decline in stock prices after Q1 2025 earnings.
